divs: Sighting DetailsI had the most amazing sighting with my 19 year old nephew, who had TWO completely unrelated sightings that day. I was driving along with him riding passenger, and he yells out "UFO alert", and I turned to see the most amazing thing. Flying beneath the cloud covered skies was a formation of about 10-15 glowing orbs. egg or football shaped. They were being flanked by another craft, bigger and with more lights. It was almost like it was shepherding them, because it's the only ship that would break formation. This happened at about 10 PM EST in Youngstown, Ohio. It was the most surreal experience of my life. It lasted about 15 seconds before the fleet went into the clouds and disappeared.
Summary: My nephew and I saw a fleet of UFOs flying in formation
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Youngstown
There were no other sightings in Youngstown on or around March 2nd 2008
